headline: Jess Carter leaves Chelsea Women to join NJ/NY Gotham FC
summary: Jess Carter has joined NWSL side NJ/NY Gotham FC bringing to an end a successful six-year spell with Chelsea. The 26-year-old played over 150 times for the Blues, whom she joined following five years at […]

headline: FA WNL introduces prize money for cup competitions
summary: With the release of the FA Women’s National League Cup draw, the FA WNL has announced prize money for its cup competitions. From the 2024/25 season, the determining round will now take place in midweek […]

headline: Scottish Women’s Premier League’s first broadcast picks for new season
summary: Broadcast selections for ScottishPower Women’s Premier League matches between rounds one and seven have been made. BBC ALBA have selected a total of seven games across the opening seven rounds, starting with Aberdeen v Rangers. […]

headline: Charlton Athletic Women sign former Spurs forward Ellie Brazil
summary: Charlton Athletic have signed 25-year-old forward Ellie Brazil for the forthcoming season following her departure from Spurs. She was capped over 30 times at youth level by England from U-17s through to U-23s, played nearly […]

headline: Women’s pre-season friendlies results for 27/28 July
summary: Pre-season friendlies on Sunday 28 July included wins for Celtic and Rangers away to Everton and Sunderland respectively. Saturday 27 July Bridgwater United 0-9 Rugby Borough Enfield Town 1-3 Clapton CFC The @WeAreTheFSA Trophy winners […]

headline: Australia Women fight back to edge eleven-goal thriller with Zambia
summary: Australia came from 5-2 down to defeat Zambia 6-5 in a frantic and end-to-end Olympic Women’s Tournament group-stage game. Zambia’s Barbra Banda struck in the opening minute and went on to complete a first-half hat-trick, […]

headline: Sheffield United Women sign defender Abbie Lafayette
summary: Sheffield United have signed 22-year-old attacking full-back Abbie Lafayette from former Championship side Watford. She had joined the Hornets last summer after a successful spell with Ipswich Town, earning a move up to the Barclays […]

headline: Spain remain holders of all women’s youth titles with late winner
summary: Spain made it a hat-trick of UEFA Women’s U-19 European Championship titles with a 2-1 extra-time defeat of the Netherlands in Lithuania. They were ahead after only six minutes, as Player of the Tournament Daniela […]

headline: Portsmouth Women sign Ireland international Erin McLaughlin
summary: Portsmouth have signed Republic of Ireland international midfielder Erin McLaughlin on a one-year contract with the option of an additional 12 months. The 21-year-old joins from FAI WNL side Peamount United, with whom she made […]

headline: St James Swifts go top after seeing off Belfast Celtic comeback
summary: St James Swifts knocked non-playing leaders Sion Swifts off the top of the NIWFA Championship with a 3-2 defeat of Belfast Celtic. But it did take a last-minute Chloe Doak strike to secure the points […]
